"A Newbie's Cauldron Exploration":
"Oh, there you are, <%me>.
Hey, don't look so surprised! I mean, I called you by
your real name, didn't I? Frankly, I still have an
uncontrollable urge to call you Newbie. Hm, maybe
I WILL stop calling you by your real name. Tell you
what. If you want me to keep using your real name,
complete this simple little request, okay,
<%me>?
*Complete the mission within 20 minutes
and earn an S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."
"へっぽこぴーの火山洞窟探索"

"<%me>見っけ！
ちょっとちょっと、せっかく名前で
呼んであげてるのに、驚かないでよ！
アンタ本当は私に、へっぽこぴーって
呼ばれたくて仕方ないんじゃないの？
やっぱり名前で呼ぶのやめようかな？
ちゃんと名前で呼んでほしいなら
このくらい、簡単にやって見せて！
ね、<%me>！
※ハード以上、２０分以内、Ｓランククリア"
